trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Surrey
There were no other sightings in Surrey on or around January 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMerging onto 160th to the #1 Highway going West at around 7:48 am. I was carpooling with a friend and noticed something in the sky to the North. We thought at first it was a comet or something. But after further inspection it was a large black cylinder shape surrounded in a strong pink color in a Horizontal postion, it was travelling at a slow pace going east. It literally followed the #1 highway East towards Chilliwack. I called a local radio station to see if anyone else had seen it. Others called the radio station and said they had also saw it. Strange but true!
